Trigger.name: panic
Trigger.script:
if tonumber(matches[2]) > HP_panic and tonumber(matches[2]) > 10 then disableTrigger("panic") enableTrigger("healing")
if autoEnterTrigger ~= nil then bg("DarkGreen") echo("enabling "..tostring(autoEnterTrigger)) bg("black") tableAutoEnter[autoEnterTrigger]() end end

Trigger.name: healing
Trigger.script:
hp = matches[2] currentHealth = tonumber(hp)
if tonumber(hp) >= HP_healthSpell and tonumber(hp) < HP_autoEnter then heal() elseif tonumber(hp) < HP_panic then Panic() disableTrigger("healing") else if tonumber(hp) > HP_autoEnter then disableTrigger("healing") enableTrigger("check health") health(hp) end end

Trigger.name: auto enter bear
Trigger.script: if tonumber(matches[2]) >= HP_autoEnter then if current_room ~= 9 then echo("Must be above NewHaven arena\n") else ignoreTimer = true retreatSequence = "s;s;u" send("d;n;n") changeRoom("d") changeRoom("n") changeRoom("n") end disableTrigger("auto enter bear") end

Trigger.name: autoStrollCaveWorm
Trigger.script: if tonumber(matches[2]) >= HP_autoEnter then disableTrigger("autoStrollCaveWorm") if current_room ~= 967 then enableTrigger("autoStrollCaveWorm") else roamDirection = nil tempTimer(10, [[roamDirection = "w" send(roamDirection) changeRoom(roamDirection)]]) end end

Trigger.name: auto Stroll Slums
Trigger.script: if tonumber(matches[2]) >= HP_autoEnter then disableTrigger("auto Stroll Slums") if current_room ~= 289 and current_room ~= 427 then enableTrigger("auto Stroll Slums") elseif current_room == 427 then walkLoop_count = 1 walkLoop_run = true walkLoop(slums2Loop,10) else walkLoop_count = 1 walkLoop_run = true walkLoop(slumsLoop,5) end end

Trigger.name: auto enter newhaven
Trigger.script: if tonumber(matches[2]) >= HP_autoEnter then disableTrigger("auto enter newhaven") if current_room ~= 9 then echo("Must be above NewHaven arena\n") enableTrigger("auto enter newhaven") else HP_panicHangup = false lastMovement = "d" send(lastMovement) changeRoom(lastMovement) end end

Trigger.name: autoRoamGraveyard
Trigger.script: if tonumber(matches[2]) >= HP_autoEnter then disableTrigger("autoRoamGraveyard") if current_room ~= 1012 and current_room ~= 1010 then enableTrigger("autoRoamGraveyard") elseif current_room == 1010 then walkLoop_count = 1 walkLoop_run = true walkLoop(graveLoop,10) else roamDirection = "n" send(roamDirection) changeRoom(roamDirection) end end

regexCodeList.string: You attempt to cast .* but fail.

Trigger.name: Name_Line
Trigger.script:
if manual_map then return end
--handle list if matches[1]:findPattern("Quantity") ~= nil then disableTrigger("Name_Line") tempTimer(1, [[enableTrigger("Name_Line")]]) return end if matches[1]:findPattern("%d") ~= nil or matches[1]:find("You") ~= nil or matches[1]:find("you") ~= nil or matches[1]:find("The") ~= nil or matches[1]:find("cast") ~= nil or matches[1]:findPattern("%sat%s") ~= nil then return end
if matches[1]:find("dark") then enteredRoom("",nil) setRoomEnv(current_room,272) return end
disableTrigger("Name_Line") enableTrigger("Exit_Line")
enteredRoom(matches[1],nil)

Trigger.name: NewRoom
Trigger.script: if not matches[1]:find("very dark") then roam(matches[2]) end disableTimer("backtrack") moved = true

Trigger.name: Followed
Trigger.script: local littleDir = matches[2]:sub(1,1) if littleDir == "n" or littleDir == "s" then if matches[2]:find("e") then littleDir = littleDir.."e" elseif matches[2]:find("w") then littleDir = littleDir.."w" end end disableTrigger("Name_Line") changeRoom(littleDir) lastMovement = littleDir enableTrigger("Exit_Line")

Trigger.name: ExitFound
Trigger.script:
local littleExit = matches[2]:sub(1,1) if littleExit == "n" or littleExit == "s" then if matches[2]:find("e") then littleExit = littleExit.."e" elseif matches[2]:find("w") then littleExit = littleExit.."w" end end
if matches[1]:find("different") then if isActive("10Timeout","timer") == 0 and not timeoutFired then enableTimer("10Timeout") send("search "..littleExit) elseif not timeoutFired then send("search "..littleExit) else cecho("<IndianRed>Exit searching failed\n") disableTrigger("ExitFound") end return end
lastMovement = littleExit local pos_table = getRoomsByPosition(findAreaID(getRoomAreaName(getRoomArea(current_room))),targetPosition()) if table.size(pos_table) ~= 0 then local rid = pos_table[0] setRoom(rid) disableTrigger("Name_Line") enableTrigger("Exit_Line") send(littleExit) end
disableTrigger("ExitFound")

regexCodeList.string: Exp:\s(\d+) Level: (\d+) Exp needed for next level: (\d+) \((\d+)\)

Trigger.name: AutoInvite
Trigger.script:
-- Auto Enter script: autoEnterTrigger = "graveyard"
tempTimer(660,[[send("invite ethereal;invite pile;invite unhappy;invite captain")]])
if autoEnterTrigger ~= nil then tempTimer(700,[[tableAutoEnter["]]..autoEnterTrigger..[["]()]]) end

regexCodeList.string: Sorry to interrupt here, but the server will be shutting

Trigger.name: Equip
Trigger.script:
local equipment = split(matches[2],",")
if table.size(equipment) == 0 then send("g "..matches[2]:sub(1,string.len(matches[2]) - 6):trim()) else for k,v in pairs(equipment) do if v:find("here") then send("g "..v:sub(1,string.len(matches[2]) - 6):trim()) else send("g "..v:trim()) end end end
disableTrigger("Equip")

Trigger.name: Auto Bash Open
Trigger.script:
if matches[1]:find("bashed") then disableTimer("10Timeout") return end
if isActive("10Timeout","timer") == 0 and not timeoutFired then enableTimer("10Timeout") send("bash "..lastMovement..";"..lastMovement) elseif not timeoutFired then send("bash "..lastMovement..";"..lastMovement) else cecho("<IndianRed>Exit bashing failed\n") end

Timer.name: Heartbeat
expCalc
Timer.script: local expPerHour = totExp * 6 cecho(" <:SteelBlue>========= Exp per Hour: "..expPerHour.." =========\n") echo("EXPpHR",expPerHour.." Exp/hr") totExp = 0

Timer.name: backtrack
Timer.script: -- Try to keep map loaction correct, roll back move if move didn't happen walkLoop_run = false roamDirection = nil changeRoom(inverseDirection(lastMovement)) disableTimer("backtrack") echo("I didn't move, reverting position.\n")

Timer.name: debug print
MagicPause
Timer.script: disableTimer("MagicPause") if currentHealth < HP_autoEnter then heal() end

Alias.name: Prep For Monsters
Alias.script:
if current_room == nil then echo("I don't know where I am.\n") return end
prep()

Alias.name: Auto Enter Arena
Alias.script:
if current_room == nil then echo("I don't know where I am.\n") return end
--disable any existing auto enters if autoEnterTrigger ~= nil then autoEnterTrigger = nil end
--enable correct auto enter autoEnterTrigger = matches[2] tableAutoEnter[autoEnterTrigger]()

Alias.name: Disable Auto Enter
Alias.script: if autoEnterTrigger ~= nil then echo(tostring(autoEnterTrigger).." disabled\n") autoEnterTrigger = nil else echo("Auto enter already disabled\n") end walkLoop_run = false walkLoop_pause = false roamDirection = nil

Alias.name: UnPrep for Monsters
Alias.script:
if autoEnterTrigger ~= nil then echo(tostring(autoEnterTrigger).." disabled
") autoEnterTrigger = nil else echo("Auto enter already disabled
") end
if isActive("Hunts", "trigger") == 1 then unPrep() else echo("Already unpreped
") end

Alias.name: Moved
Alias.script:
lastMovement = matches[1]
if manual_map then enteredRoom("",nil) else send(matches[1]) end

Alias.name: sys goto
Alias.script:
send(matches[1])
if matches[2] == "silvermere" then setRoom(319) elseif matches[2] == "rhudaur" then setRoom(1519) end
lastMovement = nil

Alias.name: Panic HangUp
Alias.script: echo("Panic hangup changed from "..tostring(HP_panicHangup).." to "..matches[2].."\n") HP_panicHangup = matches[2]

ScriptGroup.name: MajorMud
ScriptGroup.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysLoadEvent", "Startup")
function Startup() if getMudletHomeDir():find("unhappy") then mystic() elseif getMudletHomeDir():find("ethereal") then cleric() elseif getMudletHomeDir():find("pile") then paladin() elseif getMudletHomeDir():find("godd") then witchunter() elseif getMudletHomeDir():find("dryrain") then priest() else ranger() end
UIStartup() mapStartup() setTownGlobals() walkStartup()
healthStartup() enableTrigger("check health")
timeoutFired = false end

Script.name: Health
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function healthStartup() maxHP = 0 prevExp = 0 totExp = 0 magicPower = 0 end
function health(hp, ability) magicPower = ability currentHealth = tonumber(hp)
if tonumber(hp) <= HP_panic or tonumber(hp) < 10 then Panic() end
if tonumber(hp) < HP_retreat and tonumber(hp) > HP_panic then cecho("<black:sky_blue>RETREAT!") walkLoop_run = false disableTrigger("check health") disableTrigger("healing") doRetreat() send("rest") enableTrigger("healing") if autoEnterTrigger ~= nil then cecho("<:DarkGreen>Enabling "..tostring(autoEnterTrigger)) tableAutoEnter[autoEnterTrigger]() end end
if CombatTimer then echo("Combat Timer expired\n") HuntHold() end
if tonumber(hp) > maxHP then maxHP = tonumber(hp) end HP = tonumber(hp) setGauge("HP", hp, maxHP, "HP: "..HP.."/"..maxHP) disableTimer("Heartbeat") enableTimer("Heartbeat") end
function Panic() walkLoop_run = false disableTrigger("check health") disableTrigger("healing") if HP_panicHangup then disconnect() disableTimer("Heartbeat") walkLoop_run = false roamDirection = nil else doRetreat() end enableTrigger("panic") cecho ("<:red>PANIC!") currentHealth = 1 end
function heal() if isActive("MagicPause","timer") == 0 and currentHealth > HP_panic and currentHealth > 10 then echo(currentHealth) if HP_maheAvail ~= nil and magicPower > minMagic then send(HP_maheAvail..";rest") elseif HP_miheAvail ~= nil then send(HP_miheAvail..";rest") else send("rest") end enableTimer("MagicPause") echo("Healing until "..HP_autoEnter.."\n") end end
function doRetreat() if retreatSequence == "i" then send(inverseDirection(lastMovement)) changeRoom(inverseDirection(lastMovement)) elseif retreatSequence ~= nil then send(retreatSequence) local retreats = split(retreatSequence,";") for k,v in pairs(retreats) do changeRoom(v) end end retreatSequence = nil end

Script.name: Routines
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function enterArena(room,trigger) if autoEnterTrigger == nil then return end if isActive("check health","trigger") == 1 then prep() if current_room ~= room then gotoRoom(room) end enableTrigger(trigger) send("rest") else tempTimer(30,function (x) enterArena(room,trigger) end) echo("waiting to auto start\n") end end
function prep() disableTrigger("huntHold") enableTrigger("Hunts") echo("hunting enabled\n") disableTrigger("healing") enableTrigger("check health") echo("health enabled\n") retreatSequence = "i" echo("retreat enabled\n") ignoreTimer = false HP_panicHangup = true echo("defaulted timer and hangup\n") end
function unPrep() disableTrigger("Hunts") disableTrigger("huntHold") retreatSequence = "i" disableTimer("Combat") CombatTimer = false ignoreTimer = false echo("unpreped\n") end
function HuntHold() CombatTimer = false disableTimer("Combat") disableTrigger("huntHold") enableTrigger("Hunts") enableTrigger("Name_Line") walkLoop_pause = false hideWindow("DAMAGE") end
function Hunt(monster) if isActive("huntHold","trigger") == 1 then return end -- prevent issue with more than one monster when entering room
walkLoop_pause = true disableTrigger("Name_Line") disableTrigger("Exit_Line") disableTrigger("Hunts") enableTrigger("huntHold") if preSpell ~= nil and preSpellCount >= 4 and magicPower > minMagic then send(preSpell) preSpellCount = 0 else preSpellCount = preSpellCount + 1 end if attackSeq == nil then send("attack " .. string.trim(monster)) else if attackSeq[attackNum]:sub(1,1) == "i" or attackSeq[attackNum]:sub(1,1) == "c" then tempTimer(2,function (x) stopMagic(monster) end) magicFail = 0 end send(attackSeq[attackNum].." "..string.trim(monster)) attackNum = attackNum + 1 if attackNum > table.size(attackSeq) then attackNum = 1 end end
CombatTimer = false if not ignoreTimer then enableTimer("Combat") end showWindow("DAMAGE") damage = 0 echo("DAMAGE","DAMAGE: "..damage) end
function stopMagic(monster) if isActive("huntHold","trigger") == 0 then return elseif magicPower < minMagic or magicFail == 3 then cecho("<medium_purple>Switching attack method\n") disableTrigger("huntHold") send("attack "..monster) tempTimer(2,[[enableTrigger("huntHold")]]) else tempTimer(2,function (x) stopMagic(monster) end) end end
function AutoPrep() if (current_room == 1007 or current_room == 690 or current_room == 286 or current_room == 937) and isActive("Hunts","trigger") == 0 then prep() elseif (current_room == 37 or current_room == 190 or current_room == 285 or current_room == 116) and isActive("Hunts","trigger") == 1 then unPrep() end end

Script.name: Variables
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function setTownGlobals() CombatTimer = false ignoreTimer = false autoEnterTrigger = nil retreatSequence = "i" preSpellCount = 0 attackNum = 1
tableAutoEnter = { ["newhaven"] = function (x) enterArena(9,"auto enter newhaven") end, ["slums"] = function (x) enterArena(289,"auto Stroll Slums") end, ["bear"] = function (x) enterArena(9,"auto enter bear") end, ["bodyguard slums"] = function (x) enterArena(427,"auto Stroll Slums") end, ["cave worm"] = function (x) enterArena(967,"autoStrollCaveWorm") end, ["graveyard"] = function (x) enterArena(1010,"autoRoamGraveyard") end, }
slums2Loop = { "s","s","s","s","s","s","s","s","s","w","w","w","w","n","n","n","n","n","n","e","e","n","n","n","e","e" } slumsLoop = { "s","s","s","s","e","e","e","s","s","s","s","s","s","w","w","w","w","w","w","w","n","n","e","e","e","e","n","n","w","w","w","n","n","n","w","w","w","w","n","n","e","e","e","e","n","e","e","e","n","w","e","s" } darkcavern3Loop = { "nw","nw","w","s","n","e","se","se","s","s","sw","ne","n","n" } graveLoop = { "ne","e","e","n","e","e","e","n","n","n","n","n","n","n","n","n","n","w","n","n","n","w","w","w","s","s","e","s","w","w","w","s","s","s","s","e","s","s","s","s","s","s","s","sw" } end

Script.name: cleric
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Definition of cleric specific variables. -- -------------------------------------------------
function cleric() --When should panic set in? HP_panic = 25
--Should I hang up of panic? HP_panicHangup = true
--When should I retreat from room? HP_retreat = 35
--When should I start using health spells? HP_healthSpell = 25
--Which health spells are available? HP_maheAvail = "c mahe" HP_miheAvail = "c mihe"
--Handle attacking minMagic = 8 attackSeq = { "attack","c hamm" }
--When can I automatically re-enter battle? HP_autoEnter = 45
uname = "etherealsilence"
echo("Using cleric varibs\n") end

Script.name: paladin
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Definition of paladin specific variables. -- -------------------------------------------------
function paladin() --When should panic set in? HP_panic = 25 --Should I hang up of panic? HP_panicHangup = true --When should I retreat from room? HP_retreat = 35 --When should I start using health spells? HP_healthSpell = 20 --Which health spells are available? HP_maheAvail = "c mahe" HP_miheAvail = "c mihe" preSpell = "c chant"
minMagic = 8 attackSeq = { "c agon","attack" } --When can I automatically re-enter battle? HP_autoEnter = 45
uname = "pileoworthless"
echo("Using paladin varibs\n") end

Script.name: Ranger
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Definition of paladin specific variables. -- -------------------------------------------------
function ranger() --When should panic set in? HP_panic = 25 --Should I hang up of panic? HP_panicHangup = true --When should I retreat from room? HP_retreat = 35 --When should I start using health spells? HP_healthSpell = 20 --Which health spells are available? --HP_maheAvail = "c rhel" HP_miheAvail = "c mend" preSpell = nil
minMagic = 8 attackSeq = { "c chao","bash","c acid","bash" } --When can I automatically re-enter battle? HP_autoEnter = 40
uname = "captain"
echo("Using ranger varibs\n") end

Script.name: Mystic
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Definition of mystci specific variables. -- -------------------------------------------------
function mystic() --When should panic set in? HP_panic = 25 --Should I hang up of panic? HP_panicHangup = true --When should I retreat from room? HP_retreat = 35 --When should I start using health spells? HP_healthSpell = 25 --Which health spells are available? HP_maheAvail = "invoke swan" HP_miheAvail = nil preSpell = "invoke monk"
minMagic = 5 attackSeq = { "punch","attack" } --When can I automatically re-enter battle? HP_autoEnter = 38
uname = "unhappy"
echo("Using mystic varibs\n") end

Script.name: Recon
Script.script: function reConn() walkLoop_pause = true reconnect() tempTimer(4,[[send("]]..uname..[[")]]) tempTimer(7.5,[[send("")]]) tempTimer(9,[[send("c")]]) tempTimer(9.5,[[send("m")]]) tempTimer(10,[[send("e")]]) tempTimer(10.2,[[send("c")]]) disableTrigger("Name_Line") --prevent false movement on reconnect tempTimer(20,[[enableTrigger("Name_Line")]]) end

Script.name: witchunter
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Definition of witchunter specific variables. -- -------------------------------------------------
function witchunter() --When should panic set in? HP_panic = 25
--Should I hang up of panic? HP_panicHangup = true
--When should I retreat from room? HP_retreat = 35
--When should I start using health spells? HP_healthSpell = 25
--Which spells are available? minMagic = 8 HP_maheAvail = nil HP_miheAvail = nil preSpell = nil
--Array of attacks to run through attackSeq = nil
--When can I automatically re-enter battle? HP_autoEnter = 35
uname = "godd"
echo("Using witchunter varibs\n") end

Script.name: priest
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Definition of priest specific variables. -- -------------------------------------------------
function priest() --When should panic set in? HP_panic = 25
--Should I hang up of panic? HP_panicHangup = true
--When should I retreat from room? HP_retreat = 30
--When should I start using health spells? HP_healthSpell = 25
--Which spells are available? minMagic = 8 HP_maheAvail = nil HP_miheAvail = "c mihe" preSpell = "c chant"
--Array of attacks to run through attackSeq = { "c hamm","bash" }
--When can I automatically re-enter battle? HP_autoEnter = 35
uname = "dryrain"
echo("Using priest varibs\n") end

Script.name: UI
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function UIStartup() WindowWidth, WindowHeight = getMainWindowSize(); createConsole("chat", 9, 57, 20, WindowWidth-415,0) createGauge("HP", 100, 25, WindowWidth-520, 0, "HEALTH", "dark_green") createGauge("EXP", 100, 25, WindowWidth-520, 25, "EXP", "PaleTurquoise") createLabel("EXPpHR", WindowWidth-520, 50, 100, 25, 1) setBackgroundColor("EXPpHR", 218, 165, 32, 255) createLabel("DAMAGE", WindowWidth-520, 75, 100, 25, 1) setBackgroundColor("DAMAGE",254,186,173,255) hideWindow("DAMAGE")
HBox = Geyser.HBox:new({name="HBox", x=WindowWidth-415, y=WindowHeight-400, width=400, height=400,}) local mapper = Geyser.Mapper:new({name = "mapper"},HBox) end
function resizeEvent( event, x, y ) WindowWidth, WindowHeight = getMainWindowSize(); -- move chat window moveWindow("chat",WindowWidth-415,0) if WindowHeight-400 < 300 then resizeWindow("chat",400,WindowHeight-400) else resizeWindow("chat",400,300) end
moveWindow("HP",WindowWidth-520,0) moveWindow("EXP",WindowWidth-520,25) moveWindow("EXPpHR",WindowWidth-520,50) moveWindow("DAMAGE",WindowWidth-520,75)
HBox:move(WindowWidth-415,WindowHeight-400) end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysWindowResizeEvent", "resizeEvent")

Script.name: mapping
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
mudlet = mudlet or {}; mudlet.mapper_script = true
registerAnonymousEventHandler("setPlayerLoc", "setPlayerLocation")
function mapStartup() lastMovement = nil current_room = nil manual_map = false auto_map = false
loadMap() addMapEvent("I'm Here", "setPlayerLoc") echo("Default map loaded\n") end
function setPlayerLocation(evet, list, rm) setRoom(rm) lastMovement = nil enableTrigger("Name_Line") disableTrigger("Exit_Line") end
function doSpeedWalk() if current_room == nil then echo("I don't know where I am\n") return end if isActive("huntHold","trigger") == 1 then cecho("<IndianRed>In battle! Speedwalk ignored.\n") return end
auto_map = false sWalk = true sWalkAttempts = 0 moved = true
echo("Path we need to take: " .. table.concat(speedWalkDir, ", ") .. "\n") echo("Rooms we'll pass through: " .. table.concat(speedWalkPath, ", ") .. "\n")
walkLoop_pause = true speedWalk(1,isActive("Hunts","trigger")) disableTrigger("Hunts") end
function speedWalk(stepNumber,hunt) local stepSpeed = 1.7
if stepNumber <= table.size(speedWalkDir) and sWalk and moved then local direction = speedWalkDir[stepNumber] if direction:sub(1,1) == "u" or direction:sub(1,1) == "d" then vSub = direction:sub(1,1) --up and down come as full words else vSub = direction end
lastMovement = vSub if direction:find("search") then enableTrigger("ExitFound") end send(direction)
stepNumber = stepNumber + 1 sWalkAttempts = 1 moved = false tempTimer(stepSpeed,[[speedWalk(]]..stepNumber..[[,]]..hunt..[[)]]) elseif not moved and sWalkAttempts <= 3 then --try to move again tempTimer(stepSpeed,[[speedWalk(]]..stepNumber..[[,]]..hunt..[[)]]) cecho("<yellow>Failed to move, will check "..3-sWalkAttempts.." more time(s)\n") sWalkAttempts = sWalkAttempts + 1 else walkLoop_pause = false if hunt == 1 then enableTrigger("Hunts") end cecho("<IndianRed>Speedwalk Complete\n") end end
function enteredRoom(room_name,area_name) if current_room == nil then local room_list = searchRoom(room_name) if table.size(room_list) == 1 then for rid,rname in pairs(room_list) do setLocation(rid) end else echo("I don't know where I am\n") end else local exitRoomID = findExit(lastMovement) if exitRoomID then setRoom(exitRoomID) if getRoomName(exitRoomID) == "" then setRoomName(exitRoomID,room_name) end else if auto_map or manual_map then createRoom(room_name,area_name) else echo(" - Room not found\n") end end end end
function createRoom(room_name,area_name) if area_name == nil then if current_room == nil then echo("can't find an area for the room\n") return else area_name = getRoomAreaName(getRoomArea(current_room)) end else addAreaName(area_name) current_room = nil end
pos_table = getRoomsByPosition(findAreaID(area_name),targetPosition()) if table.size(pos_table) ~= 0 then rid = pos_table[0] setExit(rid,current_room,inverseDirection(lastMovement)) setExit(current_room,rid,lastMovement) setRoom(rid) return end
rid = createRoomID() addRoom(rid) setRoomName(rid,room_name) setRoomArea(rid,findAreaID(area_name)) setRoomCoordinates(rid,targetPosition())
if current_room ~= nil then setExit(rid,current_room,inverseDirection(lastMovement)) setExit(current_room,rid,lastMovement) end
setRoom(rid) echo("Room "..room_name.." ("..rid..") created\n") end
function changeRoom(direction) local rid = findExit(direction) if rid then setRoom(rid) lastMovement = direction else cecho("<yellow>No exit "..direction.."\n") end end
function findExit(direction) if direction:find("go") or direction:find("push") or direction:find("climb") or direction:find("more") then local exits = getSpecialExits(current_room) for rid,command_table in pairs(exits) do for command,locked in pairs(command_table) do if command:find(direction) then return rid end end end else local exits = getRoomExits(current_room) if table.contains(exits,longDirection(direction)) then local rid = exits[longDirection(direction)] return rid end end return false end
function setRoom(room_id) current_room = room_id centerview(room_id) AutoPrep() end
function describeRoom(room_id) echo("Room "..room_id.." - "..getRoomName(room_id).." in area "..getRoomAreaName(getRoomArea(room_id)).."\n") end
function findRoom(room_name) local room_list = searchRoom(room_name) if table.size(room_list) ~= 0 then for rid,rname in pairs(room_list) do describeRoom(rid) end else echo("Room not found\n") end end
function mapControl(inst) if inst == "save" then saveMap() echo("default map saved\n") elseif inst == "load" then loadMap() updateMap() echo("default map loaded\n") elseif inst:find("delete") ~= nil then if inst:find("area") then aname = inst:sub(13,inst:len()) aid = findAreaID(aname) if aid ~= nil then deleteArea(aid) echo("area "..aname.." deleted\n") else echo("area "..aname.." does not exist\n") end elseif inst:find("room") then rid = inst:sub(13,inst:len()) if roomExists(rid) then deleteRoom(rid) echo("room "..rid.." deleted\n") else echo("room "..rid.." does not exist\n") end elseif inst:find("all") ~= nil then local list = getAreaTable() for area, id in pairs(list) do deleteArea(id) end current_room = nil lastMovement = nil echo("all map areas deleted\n") end elseif inst:find("create") ~= nil then if inst:find("area") ~= nil then aname = inst:sub(13,inst:len()) createRoom("",aname) echo("area "..aname.." created\n") end elseif inst:find("describe") ~= nil then if inst:find("room") ~= nil then rid = inst:sub(15,inst:len()) if roomExists(rid) then describeRoom(rid) else echo("room "..rid.." does not exist\n") end end elseif inst:find("rename") ~= nil then if inst:find("room") ~= nil then rname = inst:sub(13,inst:len()) if current_room ~= nil then setRoomName(current_room,rname) describeRoom(current_room) else echo("I don't know where I am.\n") end end elseif inst:find("find") ~= nil then if inst:find("room") ~= nil then findRoom(inst:sub(11,inst:len())) end elseif inst:find("where am i") then if current_room ~= nil then describeRoom(current_room) else echo("I don't know where I am.\n") end elseif inst:find("goto") ~= nil then gotoRoom(inst:sub(6,inst:len())) elseif inst == "manual on" then manual_map = true auto_map = false echo("manual mapping enabled\n") elseif inst == "manual off" then manual_map = false echo("manual mapping disabled\n") elseif inst == "auto on" then auto_map = true manual_map = false echo("auto mapping enabled\n") elseif inst == "auto off" then auto_map = false echo("auto mapping disabled\n") else echo("Map command not found\n") end end
function inverseDirection(direction) if direction == "n" then return "s" elseif direction == "s" then return "n" elseif direction == "e" then return "w" elseif direction == "w" then return "e" elseif direction == "ne" then return "sw" elseif direction == "nw" then return "se" elseif direction == "se" then return "nw" elseif direction == "sw" then return "ne" elseif direction == "u" then return "d" elseif direction == "d" then return "u" end end
function longDirection(direction) if direction == "n" then return "north" elseif direction == "s" then return "south" elseif direction == "e" then return "east" elseif direction == "w" then return "west" elseif direction == "ne" then return "northeast" elseif direction == "nw" then return "northwest" elseif direction == "se" then return "southeast" elseif direction == "sw" then return "southwest" elseif direction == "u" then return "up" elseif direction == "d" then return "down" end end
function targetPosition() if current_room == nil then return 0,0,0 else x,y,z = getRoomCoordinates(current_room)
if lastMovement:find("n") ~= nil then y = y + 2 end if lastMovement:find("s") ~= nil then y = y - 2 end if lastMovement:find("e") ~= nil then x = x + 2 end if lastMovement:find("w") ~= nil then x = x - 2 end if lastMovement:find("u") ~= nil then z = z + 1 elseif lastMovement:find("d") ~= nil then z = z - 1 end
return x,y,z end end
function findAreaID(areaname) local list = getAreaTable()
-- iterate over the list of areas, matching them with substring match. -- if we get match a single area, then return it's ID, otherwise return -- 'false' and a message that there are than one are matches local returnid, fullareaname for area, id in pairs(list) do if area == areaname then if returnid then return false, "more than one area matches" end returnid = id; fullareaname = area end end
return returnid, fullareaname end
function split(str,c) local aCount = 0 local array = {} local a = string.find(str, c)
while a do array[aCount] = string.sub(str, 1, a - 1)
aCount = aCount + 1 array[aCount] = string.sub(str, a + 1, string.len(str)) a = string.find(array[aCount], c) str = array[aCount] end return array end

Script.name: AutoWalk
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function walkStartup() walkLoop_run = false --keep stepping through loop walkLoop_pause = false --temporarily stop running steps walkLoop_count = 1 --current step
roamDirection = nil --direction to roam end
function walkLoop(loop,time) if walkLoop_run and not walkLoop_pause and HP > HP_autoEnter then cecho("<lawn_green>Walk loop "..loop[walkLoop_count].."\n") send(loop[walkLoop_count]..";rest") lastMovement = loop[walkLoop_count] walkLoop_count = walkLoop_count + 1 if walkLoop_count > table.size(loop) then walkLoop_count = 1 end changeRoom(lastMovement) enableTimer("backtrack") elseif walkLoop_pause then echo("Looping paused\n") elseif HP < HP_autoEnter then echo("Looping paused by health\n") end
if walkLoop_run then disableTrigger("Name_Line") tempTimer(time, function (x) walkLoop(loop,time) end) else enableTrigger("Name_Line") end end
function roam(exits) if roamDirection == nil then return end
local found = false local availExits = split(exits," ") for k,v in pairs(availExits) do local littleExit = v:sub(1,1) if littleExit == "n" or littleExit == "s" then if v:find("e") then littleExit = littleExit.."e" elseif v:find("w") then littleExit = littleExit.."w" end end if littleExit == roamDirection then found = true end end
if found then tempTimer(5, [[doRoam()]]) else roamDirection = inverseDirection(roamDirection) tempTimer(5, [[doRoam()]]) end end
function doRoam() if roamDirection == nil then return end
if walkLoop_pause then echo("Roaming paused\n") tempTimer(5,[[doRoam()]]) elseif currentHealth < HP_autoEnter then echo("Roaming paused by health\n") tempTimer(5,[[doRoam()]]) else cecho("<lawn_green>Roam "..roamDirection.."\n") send(roamDirection..";rest") lastMovement = roamDirection enableTimer("backtrack") end end
